data.text: @carolinahickey @MayorBowser She’s doesn’t have support for that in council
@MayorBowser Here's How CDC Just Manipulated Data to Provide Cover for Democrats https://t.co/qeKtDzPnyv

@MayorBowser @MayorBowser  why are you punishing the children and making them continue to mask...give them and their families choice. Show us what is guiding your decisions because it looks like it is the teachers union @WTUTeacher
@MayorBowser Governor DeSantis hosts a roundtable with physicians nationwide on ending COVID theater once and for all. https://t.co/ufZFzKPXuK
@MayorBowser @_DCHealth It’s time to end the school mask mandate.

@MayorBowser I know kids don’t have the same political connections as restaurant and gym owners, but they deserve the right to take off their masks. Our kids are vaxxed. They have almost no risk. One way masking works for those who want to mask. Let DC parents choose.
@MayorBowser If you aren't following the science on school masking, will you ever end it? The parents deserve to know what is guiding your policy.
